<script>
	if (typeof (window.themehouse) !== 'object') {
		window.themehouse = {};
	}
	if (typeof (window.themehouse.settings) !== 'object') {
		window.themehouse.settings = {};
	}
	window.themehouse.settings = {
		common: {
			'20171204': {
				init: false,
			},
		},
		data: {
			version: '{{property('uix_version')}}',
			jsVersion: 'No JS Files',
			templateVersion: '2.0.1.2_Release',
			betaMode: {{property('uix_betaMode')}},
			theme: '',
			url: '{{ base_url(null, true)|escape("js") }}',
			user: '{$xf.visitor.user_id}',
		},
		inputSync: {},
		minimalSearch: {
			breakpoint: "{{ 0 + property('uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth') }}",
			dropdownBreakpoint: "{{ 0 + property('uix_search_maxResponsiveWidth') }}",
		},
		sidebar: {
            enabled: '{{$uix_canCollapseSidebar}}',
			link: '{{ link("uix/toggle-sidebar.json") }}',
            state: '{{$uix_sidebarCollapsed}}',
		},
        sidebarNav: {
            enabled: '{{$uix_canCollapseSidebarNav}}',
			link: '{{ link("uix/toggle-sidebar-navigation.json") }}',
            state: '{{$uix_sidebarNavCollapsed}}',
		},
		fab: {
			enabled: {{property('uix_fabScroll')}},
		},
		checkRadius: {
			enabled: {{property('uix_borderRadiusJs')}},
			selectors: '{{property("uix_borderRadiusSelectors")}}',
		},
		nodes: {
			enabled: {{property('uix_nodeClickable')}},
		},
        nodesCollapse: {
            enabled: '{{$uix_canCollapseCategories}}',
			link: '{{ link("uix/toggle-category.json") }}',
			state: '{{$uix_collapsedCategoriesJson}}',
        },
		widthToggle: {
			enabled: '{{$uix_canTogglePageWidth}}',
			link: '{{ link("uix/toggle-width.json") }}',
			state: '{{$uix_pageWidth}}',
		},
	}

	window.document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
		<xf:if is="{{property('uix_betaMode')}}">
			window.themehouse.common['20171204'].init();
		<xf:else />
			try {
			   window.themehouse.common['20171204'].init();
			} catch(e) {
			   console.log('Error caught', e);
			}
		</xf:if>


		var jsVersionPrefix = 'No JS Files';
		if (typeof(window.themehouse.settings.data.jsVersion) === 'string') {
			var jsVersionSplit = window.themehouse.settings.data.jsVersion.split('_');
			if (jsVersionSplit.length) {
				jsVersionPrefix = jsVersionSplit[0];
			}
		}
		var templateVersionPrefix = 'No JS Template Version';
		if (typeof(window.themehouse.settings.data.templateVersion) === 'string') {
			var templateVersionSplit = window.themehouse.settings.data.templateVersion.split('_');
			if (templateVersionSplit.length) {
				templateVersionPrefix = templateVersionSplit[0];
			}
		}
		if (jsVersionPrefix !== templateVersionPrefix) {
			var splitFileVersion = jsVersionPrefix.split('.');
			var splitTemplateVersion = templateVersionPrefix.split('.');
			console.log('version mismatch', jsVersionPrefix, templateVersionPrefix);
		}

	});
</script>
{$uix_footerWidgets|raw}

        if (!href || this.loading)

            return;
        }

/****** OFF CANVAS ***/
$(document).ready(function() {
	var panels = {
		navigation: {
			position: 1
		},
		account: {
			position: 2
		},
		inbox: {
			position: 3
		},
		alerts: {
			position: 4
		}
	};
	
	
	var tabsContainer = $('.sidePanel__tabs');
	
	var activeTab = 'navigation';
	
	var activeTabPosition = panels[activeTab].position;
	
	var generateDirections = function() {
		$('.sidePanel__tabPanel').each(function() {
			var tabPosition = $(this).attr('data-content');
			var activeTabPosition = panels[activeTab].position;

			if (tabPosition != activeTab) {
				if (panels[tabPosition].position < activeTabPosition) {
					$(this).addClass('is-left');
				}

				if (panels[tabPosition].position > activeTabPosition) {
					$(this).addClass('is-right');
				}   
			}
		});
	};

	generateDirections();
	
	$('.sidePanel__tab').click(function() {
		$(tabsContainer).find('.sidePanel__tab').removeClass('sidePanel__tab--active');
		$(this).addClass('sidePanel__tab--active');
		
		activeTab = $(this).attr('data-attr');
		
		$('.sidePanel__tabPanel').removeClass('is-active');
		
		$('.sidePanel__tabPanel[data-content="' + activeTab + '"]').addClass('is-active');
		$('.sidePanel__tabPanel').removeClass('is-left').removeClass('is-right');
		generateDirections();
	});
});

/******** extra info post toggle ***********/

$(document).ready(function() {
	$('.thThreads__userExtra--trigger').click(function() {
		var parent =  $(this).parents('.message-cell--user');
	  	var triggerContainer = $(this).parent('.thThreads__userExtra--toggle');
		var container = triggerContainer.siblings('.thThreads__message-userExtras');
		var child = container.find('.message-userExtras');
		var eleHeight = child.height();
		if (parent.hasClass('userExtra--expand')) {
			container.css({ height: eleHeight });
			parent.toggleClass('userExtra--expand');
			window.setTimeout(function() {
				container.css({ height: '0' });
				window.setTimeout(function() {
					container.css({ height: '' });
				}, 200);
			}, 17);

		} else {
			parent.toggleClass('userExtra--expand');
			container.css({ height: eleHeight });
			window.setTimeout(function() {
				container.css({ height: '' });
			}, 200);
		}
	});
});


/******** Backstretch images ***********/

$(document).ready(function() {
	if ( {{ property('uix_backstretch') }} ) {
		 $("{{ property('uix_backstretchSelector') }}").backstretch([
			 {{ property('uix_backstretchImages') }}
	  ], {
			duration: {{ property('uix_backstretchDuration') }},
			fade: {{ property('uix_backstretchFade')}}
		});
	}
});
</script>

group.title: Prefixes
group.description: Sets the color and styling for thread prefixes.

group.title: Global Settings
group.description: General settings for the theme, as well as for smaller components

group.title: Icons
group.description: Settings for the main icon font for the theme.

group.title: Search
group.description: Settings related to the header search component

group.title: Breadcrumb
group.description: Settings related to the breadcrumb and its components.

group.title: Welcome Section
group.description: Settings related to the welcome section

group.title: Discussion list
group.description: Settings related to the discussion list component

group.title: Canvas Menus (currently not available)
group.description: On and off canvas menu settings

property.title: Block filter bar
property.description: When the content of a block can be filtered, the controls to do so are styled here

property.title: Block footer
property.description: When information needs to be conveyed in a footer element for a block, its style is controlled here

property.title: Block link
property.description: Some links are displayed as small blocks such as choices in a popup menu, and their background will highlight when hovered

property.title: Block link - selected
property.description: Styling for block-type links when in their selected state

property.title: Block tab header
property.description: Occasionally, blocks will have multi-part, tab headers, styled with these settings

property.title: Block tab header - selected tab
property.description: The selected tab in multi-part headers takes additional styling from here

property.title: Block text header
property.description: Text headers are used for subtle identification of content areas, without changing the background style or color

property.title: Button base
property.description: Defines the styling for the basic elements that are common to all text-based buttons

property.title: Button - call to action
property.description: Call to action buttons sit alone and invite the user to do something, like post a new thread

property.title: Button - default
property.description: Most buttons use this styling, except for primary form submit buttons

property.title: Button - disabled
property.description: When buttons are disabled and unclickable, they use these styling rules

property.title: Button - primary
property.description: These rules are used mostly for the main submit button for forms

property.title: Accented content area base
property.description: When attention needs to be directed to content, this background may be employed

property.title: Accented content area links
property.description: Links within accented content will be styled with these settings

property.title: Body Text Font
property.description: This font is used for the text of messages etc.
property.value: "\"Roboto\", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, \"Segoe UI\", \"Oxygen\", \"Ubuntu\", \"Cantarell\", \"Fira Sans\", \"Droid Sans\", \"Helvetica Neue\", sans-serif"

property.title: Code Font
property.description: The font list used for mono-spaced text input and output

property.title: User Interface Font
property.description: The font list for your main text
property.value: "\"Roboto\", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, \"Segoe UI\", \"Oxygen\", \"Ubuntu\", \"Cantarell\", \"Fira Sans\", \"Droid Sans\", \"Helvetica Neue\", sans-serif"

property.title: Global action indicator color
property.description: This is the base color of the gadgets that display when an action is being processed in the background.

property.title: Inline moderation bar
property.description: A bar containing controls appears when content is selected for inline moderation. Its appearance is controlled here

property.title: Inline moderation highlight color
property.description: When content is selected for inline moderation, its background color will be replaced with this

property.title: Form input
property.description: Controls the style of most text-input boxes

property.title: Form input - disabled
property.description: When text boxes are disabled, these rules are applied

property.title: Member profile header - name
property.description: The styling of the name of the member whose page is being viewed is controlled here

property.title: Member tooltip header
property.description: The member tooltip, which appears when hovering over user names, is styled with these controls

property.title: Member tooltip header - name
property.description: Styling for the name of the user whose tooltip is being displayed

property.title: Menu
property.description: Controls the main block of all popup menus

property.title: Menu feature border color
property.description: Popup menus have a thick feature border on their upper edge, the styling of which is controlled here

property.title: Menu footer
property.description: When a popup menu has a bottom, footer element, it will use these settings

property.title: Menu header
property.description: Most menus identify themselves with a header just underneath their top border

property.title: Menu link row - selected
property.description: Styling for link rows in menus, when selected or hovered

property.title: Menu tab header
property.description: Multi-part, tabbed menu headers use these settings

property.title: New message indicator
property.description: Usually a small token attached to the message block, the indicator that a message is new/unread is controlled here

property.title: Message padding
property.description: When using the full-size message block, this value defines the size of the padding around the message text

property.title: Message signature
property.description: Any rules used to apply styling to users' signatures in their messages are defined here

property.title: Message user info elements
property.description: The elements selected here will be displayed in the message user info block. It will not be displayed below the single column width.

property.title: Description display style
property.description: To save vertical space, it is possible to hide node descriptions until the node title is hovered, at which point they are displayed in a tooltip

property.title: Sub-forums display style
property.description: Choose the style in which sub-forums will be displayed within a particular node element, according to the amount of space you want them to occupy

property.title: Overlay header
property.description: Overlays use a header element to identify their contents, styled here

property.title: Progress bar color
property.description: The progress bar appears at the top of the window when the system is waiting for a response from the server

property.title: Favicon URL (32x32)
property.description: Path to the small logo that is associated with bookmarks pointing to your site

property.title: Footer links
property.description: Controls styling for individual links within the footer

property.title: Navigation collapse width
property.description: Below this page width, the navigation system will collapse down into an off canvas menu

property.title: Navigation padding horizontal
property.description: Defines the amount of padding applied horizontally to each main navigational tab in the header

property.title: Navigation padding vertical
property.description: This value defines the amount of padding applied to the main navigational tabs in the header

property.title: Sticky navigation element
Navigation row - menu open
property.description: Styling applied when the popup menu for the current tab is visible

property.title: Sub-navigation row - menu-open element
property.description: Styles sub-navigation elements whose popup menu is currently open

property.title: Sub-navigation padding vertical
property.description: Defines the amount of vertical padding applied to each item in the sub-navigation bar in the header

property.title: Page edge spacer removal break point
property.description: When the page is narrower than this value, the spacers at the edge of the page are discarded

property.title: Display page jump buttons on scroll
property.description: If enabled, floating buttons will be displayed shortly after the page is scrolled which allow you to jump to the top or bottom of the page. If this is only triggered when scrolling up, only a jump to top button will be displayed.

property.title: Standalone tabs
property.description: Tabs that are not part of block headers are styled here

property.title: Standalone tabs - selected tab
property.description: The selected tab in groups that are not part of block headers

property.title: Style type
property.description: This defines the general type of style in use based on whether the content is placed on a light or dark background. This may change how colors are selected in certain scenarios.

property.title: Text color
property.description: Unless otherwise specified, text will be this color

property.title: Mobile active navigation title
property.description: Adds a short version of the active navigation to the header when navigation links collapse to the canvas navigation

property.title: List of additional css templates to include
property.description: A comma separated list of additional CSS/less templates to load. Requires the .css or .less suffix

property.title: Avatar shape
property.description: Changes the shape of avatars (may overwrite avatar border radius style property)

property.title: Backstretch
property.description: Adds an image or image slideshow to any target element

property.title: Backstretch duration
property.description: Sets the amount of time (in milliseconds) that each image will be visible.

property.title: Backstretch fade
property.description: Sets the speed (in milliseconds) that the images fade out/in.

property.title: Backstretch images
property.description: Enter a list of images where each image is wrapped in quotes. If you add multiple images, every line minus the last one should be followed by a comma. Ex: "image/bg1.jpg", "image/bg2.jpg"

property.title: Backstretch selector
property.description: CSS selector for where to apply Backstretch to. For entire document, enter: body

property.title: Beta Mode
property.description: For development and bug-finding purposes. DO NOT enable on a live site.

property.title: Block body
property.description: Styles the body of block level components

property.title: Block container
property.description: Styles the container for Block level components

property.title: Enable Smart Border Radius Javascript
property.description: Enables context-aware border-radius rules. Very helpful, especially in the header.

property.title: Border Radius Javascript Selectors
property.description: Only used if smart radius javascript is enabled. Comma separated list of javascript selectors. Do not include single quotes (')

property.title: Bottom breadcrumb location
property.value_parameters: outsideWrapper=Outside wrapper insideWrapper = Inside wrapper insideContent=Inside content

property.title: Logo breakpoint
property.description: Max viewport width to switch to the brandmark image. Use 100% for always, 0 for never, and other values in pixels

property.title: Breadcrumb Item
property.description: Individual breadcrumb items

property.title: Breadcrumb Container
property.description: Styles the breadcrumb container

property.title: Breadcrumb wrapper
property.description: container surrounding breadcrumb and page action if applicable

property.title: Button ripple effect
property.description: Adds a ripple animation to buttons on press

property.title: Button (small)
property.description: Styles small (and also filter bar) buttons

property.title: Collapsible categories
property.description: Enables a trigger to collapse 1st level category nodes

property.title: Category icon style
property.description: Styles the category strip icon if applicable

property.title: Category Strip
property.description: Styles the category strip for nodes

property.title: Category strip icons
property.description: Adds the UI.X Folder icon to category strips

property.title: Move category strip outside wrapper
property.description: Moves the category strip outside of the level 1 node container

property.title: Collapsible extra info
property.description: Collapses the postbit extra info (such as joined, messages, trophies, etc..) and adds a trigger to expand them

property.title: Collapsible sidebar
property.description: Adds a trigger to collapse and expand the sidebar

property.title: Content Wrapper
property.description: Sets where the styling for Content Wrapper will be applied
property.value_parameters: 0=Default (no wrapper) 1= Wrapper around main content and sidebar 2=Wrapper around main content only

property.title: Separate Header from Content Wrapper
property.description: Adds margin-bottom to header

property.title: Elevation 1
property.description: Sets the box-shadow value for elevation level 1

property.title: Elevation 2
property.description: Sets the box shadow value for elevation level 2

property.title: Page action as floating action button
property.description: Adds the page action as a floating action button

property.title: Floating action button placeholder background color
property.description: Sets the background color of the placeholder spacer in the footer.

property.title: Show FAB on scroll up only
Floating action button Viewport width
property.description: Sets the minimum viewport width to hide the floating action button

property.title: Footer chooser
property.description: Styles the footer chooser (ex. style chooser, width toggle, language chooser)

property.title: Footer widget icons
property.description: Adds icons to the footer widget titles

property.title: Footer menu
property.description: Styles the footer menu bar

property.title: Footer widget
property.description: Styles the widget block

property.title: Footer Widget body
property.description: Styles the body of the footer widgets

property.title: Footer widget footer
property.description: Styles the footer area of widgets in the footer.

property.title: Footer widget header
property.description: Styles the minor heading block is footer widgets

property.title: Footer widget spacing
property.description: Sets the spacing in between each widget.

property.title: Footer widget preferred width
property.description: Set the preferred widget size. (Uses flex-basis)

property.title: Force cover copyright row
property.description: Forces the copyright row to be full width regardless of the Page Setup > Page Style style property.

property.title: Force cover extended footer
property.description: Forces the extended footer row to be full width regardless of the Page Setup > Page Style style property.

property.title: Force cover footer menu
property.description: Forces the footer menu row to be full width regardless of the Page Setup > Page Style style property.

property.title: Google Fonts
property.description: Choose the fonts in which to load from Google Fonts API.

property.title: Header whitespace
property.description: Pixel value of the margin between navigation, user bar, and logo block

property.title: Header wrapper
property.description: Styles the wrapper around the entire header

property.title: Secondary font
property.description: Font family used for headings and other decorative text situations.
property.value: "\"Roboto\", -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, \"Segoe UI\", \"Oxygen\", \"Ubuntu\", \"Cantarell\", \"Fira Sans\", \"Droid Sans\", \"Helvetica Neue\", sans-serif"

property.title: Hide elements during javascript loading
property.description: Disabling this will potentially cause flashes of unstyled content, but may be necessary for some caches or CDNs.

property.title: Hide breadcrumb on top-level pages
property.description: Removes the breadcrumb when there is only one crumb to display

property.title: Home breadcrumb as icon
property.description: Swaps out the "home" text in the breadcrumb for the home icon

property.title: Icon font
Birthday
property.description: Styles the birthday (or age) label for users

property.title: Close
property.description: Such as closing modals, canvas navigation

property.title: Earth
property.description: Used for translate

property.title: Location
property.description: location for users

property.title: Menu
property.description: Ex. Canvas navigation trigger

property.title: Menu Down
property.description: Ex. Arrow for dropdown menus

property.title: Image path
property.description: Sets the path to images for the theme.

property.title: Javascript Path
property.description: The path to the theme's javascript directory relative to /js/themehouse/ . Allows for multiple versions of UI.X and/or Audentio.com products to be installed and not share the same javascript functions. Only change this if you are certain you should be.

property.title: Login trigger style
property.description: The method in which the login form displays once the trigger is activated.

property.title: Search in logo block
property.description: Moves the search component to logo block if logo block is enabled and viewport width is above the minimum width to show the logo block. Both of these options are set in Header and Navigation.

property.title: Logo icon
property.description: Adds a CSS font icon when logo text is applicable.

property.title: Logo icon
property.description: Styles the logo icon

property.title: Logo small image path
property.description: If left blank, will default to main logo path

property.title: Logo text
property.description: Adds text in place of a logo. Note: this is overwritten when a logo image path is set

property.title: Logo text breakpoint
property.description: The device width under which the logo text changes font-size.

property.title: Logo width
property.description: Sets the width for logo

property.title: Message
property.description: Styles the message container

property.title: Message action bar
property.description: Styles the action bar for messages

property.title: Message attachments
property.description: Styles the container for the message attachments component.

property.title: Message body
property.description: Styles the body (main content) of message

property.title: Message control
property.description: Styles the message actions such as reply and report

property.title: Message like bar
property.description: Styles the "Likes" bar for messages

property.title: Message Main
property.description: Styles the main section of message

property.title: Message meta bar
property.description: Styles the meta (attribution bar), which houses the post date and post number

property.title: Logo height (navigation) DEPRECATED
property.description: Sets the height of the logo when in navigation

property.title: Navigation Logo Text Breakpoint
property.description: The device width under which the Navigation Logo Text changes font-size

property.title: Navigation bar height
property.description: Sets the height of the primary navigation bar. (Note: this gets overwritten by sticky nav bar height when applicable. If unset, the navigation bar height will simply be as large as the largest component inside of it.)

property.title: Navigation type
property.description: Sets the type of navigation style.

property.title: New node indicator
property.description: Will display a new indicator next to the node title if there is new content

property.title: New node indicator
property.description: Styles the new node indicator if enabled

property.title: Node body
property.description: Styles the individual node body

property.title: Node body (hover)
property.description: Adds a hover state to nodes

property.title: Clickable nodes
property.description: Makes the entire node a clickable link to the forum. (Ignores other inner links.)

property.title: Node Container
property.description: Styles the block-container for level 1 nodes

property.title: Node Description
property.description: Styles the descrption of level 2 nodes

property.title: Node icon width
property.description: Sets the width for the node icon container (not the actual icon itself)

property.title: Show node stats only on hover
property.description: Hides the node stats, and displays them only when hovering over the node

property.title: Page style
property.description: Sets the overall page style for the theme.

property.title: Page title
property.description: Styles the h1 in titlebar

property.title: Postbit avatar size
property.description: Sets the size of the post bit avatar

property.title: Post bit icons
property.description: Changes the user extra info labels to icons

property.title: Primary brand color
property.description: Primary brand color

property.title: primary brand color (darker)
property.description: Darker variation of the primary brand color. (This would generally map to Google's Material design spec as the 700 value of the primary color.)

property.title: Remove Title from Forum Index
property.description: Removes the page title from the forum index. Note: Only applicable when there are no other components in titlebar (such as page action or sidebar toggle.)

property.title: Remove message arrow
property.description: Removes the arrow on postbit for messages

property.title: Remove forum list page actions
property.description: Removes the page actions from the forum list. By default these are New Posts and Post New Thread.

property.title: Remove page title (forum list)
property.description: Removes the page title on forum index

property.title: Remove selected tab sublinks
property.description: Note: Only applicable when navigation style is set to default.

property.title: Responsive logo font size
property.description: Sets a font size to override logo font size at a specific breakpoint

property.title: Responsive Navigation Logo Font Size
property.description: Sets the font size for smaller viewport widths (likely mobile.)

property.title: Right align navigation
property.description: Aligns the navigation and section links to the right side

property.title: Search bar width
property.description: (Required for minimal search animation)

property.title: Add Button to the QuickSearch
property.description: Enabling this setting will add a functional submit button to the QuickSearch.

property.title: Search icon
property.description: Styles the search icon

property.title: Search icon behavior
property.description: Sets the behavior for the search icon (when the search is only an icon, and not the full input.)

property.title: Search position
property.description: Sets where the search bar appears

property.title: Viewport Width to Show Search Icon
property.description: Enter the maximum viewport width at which the search icon replaces the search bar.

property.title: Secondary brand color
property.description: Used for hover and active state

property.title: Collapse sidebar navigation section links
property.description: Collapses the active tabs section links by default. Note: Only applicable when navigation style is set to sidebar navigation.

property.title: Sidebar breakpoint
property.description: Minimum viewport width to show sidebar before breaking under content

property.title: Sidebar heading icons
property.description: Adds icons to the sidebar headings

property.title: Sidebar location
property.description: Moves the sidebar to the left of the main content

property.title: Sidebar navigation width
property.description: Styles the Sidebar nav component

property.title: Sidebar widget wrapper
property.description: Styles the side widget block-container

property.title: Force scrolling notices to all be primary notices
property.description: Sets the styling for all scrolling notices to be primary notices.

property.title: Social media icon
property.description: Styles the general social media icons that are set in UI.X Social Media board options

property.title: Move social media to Header row
property.description: Moves the social media component to Header row if Header row is enabled and viewport width is above the minimum width to show the Header row. Both of these settings are set in Header and Navigation.

property.title: Social media position
property.description: Choose where to have the social media component

property.title: Sticky category strips
property.description: Category strips will stick to the top of the page for the category that is currently in view.

property.title: Height of the sticky navigation bar
Sticky section link height
property.description: Sets the height for the sticky section links bar

property.title: Sticky sidebar
property.description: Makes both the sidebar as well as the sidenav sticky.

property.title: Sticky staffbar height
property.description: Sets the height of the sticky staff bar

property.title: Sub-forum title
property.description: Styles the sub forum titles when they are displayed

property.title: Show tablinks in sidebar nav
property.description: Only applicable for Sidebar navigation style

property.title: Tag
property.description: Styles tags

property.title: Thread field
property.description: Styles custom thread fields

property.title: Titlebar
property.description: Styles the wrapper around page title and page description

property.title: Titlebar location
property.description: Sets where the titlebar should appear in the page
property.value_parameters: default=Default (outside of main body) insideWrapper= Inside of wrapper insideBody=Inside main body header=Bottom of header

property.title: Top breadcrumb location
property.value_parameters: header=Bottom of header outsideWrapper=Outside of page wrapper insideWrapper=Inside of wrapper insideBody=Inside body

property.title: UI.X Version
property.description: This style property should not be edited, it is used to help with debugging issues

property.title: Viewport width to center the logo block
property.description: Sets the maximum width to center the logo block. This causes all logo block components to stack vertically, and aligned in the center. Set never and 100% for always.

property.title: Viewport width to collapse staffbar links
property.description: Sets the max width for the staff links to be collapsed into one admin link

property.title: Viewport width to collapse node stats
property.description: This sets the minimum viewport width to show the full node stat display. (Note: not applicable with Node Grid)

property.title: Viewport width to condense visitor tabs
Viewport width to remove login text
Viewport width to remove visitor tab text
property.description: Sets the minimum viewport width to display the conversations, alert and username text.

property.title: Minimum viewport width to show logo block
Visitor panel stats as icons
property.description: Changes the visitor stats in the visitor panel to icons instead of text

property.title: Visitor tabs location (mobile) BETA
property.description: Choose where the visitor tabs should go for mobile
property.value_parameters: initial=Initial (don't change) tabbar= Tab bar canvas=Canvas

property.title: Display welcome section on forum list only
Welcome section location
property.description: Chooses where to insert the welcome section
property.value_parameters: header=Bottom of header outsideWrapper=Outside of page wrapper insideWrapper=Inside of wrapper insideBody=Inside of body

property.title: Welcome section icon
property.description: Enter the class name for an icon of an icon font

property.title: Welcome section text
property.value: "Wanting to join the rest of our members? Feel free to sign up today."

property.title: Widget padding
property.description: Sets the default padding for sidebar widgets
